nodes.text: A male Rodian worked as a fruit vendor in the settlement of Kothal on the planet Lothal in the year 5 BBY.[source?] When the rebels Garazeb Orrelios and Ezra Bridger arrived in Kothal searching for supplies, the vendor was selling fruits from his stall including thorn pears and jogan fruits. He had green skin and black eyes and wore a brown brown shirt while at his stall. While trying to sell his product he spoke in Huttese.
The vendor first appeared in "Fighter Flight," the fourth episode of the first season of the animated television series Star Wars Rebels, which premiered on Disney XD on October 13, 2015.
